functional_jobs.job_statement: When I am looking for events to join, I want to easily find the events and their details, so I can choose which ones to participate in.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Using the website to check the calendar and event details.
pain_points: Difficult navigation requiring multiple backtracking steps.
No search functionality on the website.
Lack of clarity on registration status and event capacity.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A streamlined process for finding and signing up for events with clear status updates.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Ability to quickly locate events using a search function and easily access event details.

functional_jobs.job_statement: When I need to sign up for events, I want a seamless registration process, so I can participate without hassle.
pain_points: Website registration process is slow and clunky.
Issues with captcha slowing down the process.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A fast and efficient registration process that minimizes unnecessary steps.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Ability to register for events quickly without technical difficulties.

functional_jobs.job_statement: When I want to see what events I have signed up for, I want to easily find that information, so I can keep track of my commitments.
functional_jobs.current_solution: Checking my emails or using the app.
pain_points: Difficulty in locating signed-up events on the website.
Inconsistent visibility of event registration status.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A straightforward way to view all my signed-up events in one place.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: Ability to see all signed-up events in my profile on the website or app.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I participate in events, I want to feel connected and included, so I can enjoy the social aspect of the newcomers club.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Attending events and engaging with other members.
pain_points: Feeling left out if I cannot see who else is attending.
Frustration with event descriptions that lack clarity.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A sense of belonging and assurance that I am part of a community.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Feeling welcomed and able to connect with others at events.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I interact with the website or app, I want to feel confident in my ability to navigate it, so I can manage my participation easily.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Using the app for a more user-friendly experience.
pain_points: Anxiety about missing important event details.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: Confidence in using the platform without frustration.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Ease of use without needing assistance or guidance.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I attend events, I want to be perceived as an engaged and active member of the community, so I can build my social network.
social_jobs.current_solution: Participating in various events and connecting with members.
pain_points: Difficulty in finding events that suit my interests.
Uncertainty about who else will be attending.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Recognition as a proactive and involved member.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Building relationships and being recognized by other members.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I seek information about alumni, I want to be seen as someone who values past connections, so I can maintain relationships.
social_jobs.current_solution: Inquiring about contact information for alumni.
pain_points: Inability to find alumni in the directory.
Lack of visibility for alumni members.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Easily connect with alumni to foster ongoing relationships.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Access to an alumni directory or contact information.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I consider joining committees, I want to have clear information about roles and responsibilities, so I can make informed decisions.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Occasionally checking committee information on the website.
pain_points: Lack of detailed descriptions for committee roles.
Difficulty in understanding the application process for board positions.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Comprehensive understanding of opportunities for involvement.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Availability of clear, accessible information about committee roles and responsibilities.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I need to cancel an event, I want a straightforward process to do so, so I can manage my commitments effectively.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Contacting the committee chair to cancel.
pain_points: Inefficient cancellation process through the website.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Ability to cancel events with a single click or straightforward method.
